project.name: J-C197A-JENA-08-ST02-DT03-DF11-CF14-01
project.description: This test takes in a value from a taint source. The value is truncated to an integer, and then used to generate a random number within a range. If the converted integer value is negative, SecureRandom.nextInt(value) will throw a RuntimeException.
